name: Robusto
additionalNotes:
Dominican Green Label - Mac Alt
Dominican Republic
Wrapper: Conn	Binder: DR	Filler: DR
Mild Bodied
Macanudo Alternatives are manufactured in the Dominican Republic. Though these cigars are not manufactured by Macanudo they are extremly similar in taste to Macanudo, with impeccable construction and quality. Same mild flavor at a fraction of the price.
